declarations.name: Default
declarations.default:
{ render: args => html` ${template( args, html` 
<button appearance="accent">Accent</button> <button appearance="neutral">Neutral</button> <button appearance="lightweight">Lightweight</button> 
export default () => { return ( <> <button appearance="accent">Accent</button> <button appearance="neutral">Neutral</button> <button appearance="lightweight">Lightweight</button> </> ); };
`, )}`, args: {}, }
